Employee concerns are actively solicited, impartially judged and transparently addressed
To reach a sustainable future, every company must take steps to minimise employee concerns, and implement internal controls to identify and deal fairly with any issues that do arise.
This is achieved by implementing a formal concerns mechanism to solicit and manage any issues, and outlining the steps to be taken to address issues when they are raised.
